name: Tour around fortres in city of Nis.
description:
Fortres of Nis is extant fortification is of Turkish
 origin, dating from the first decades of the 18th century (1719–1723). 
It is well known as one of the most significant and best preserved 
monuments of this kind in the mid-Balkans. The Fortress was erected on the site of earlier fortifications – the ancient Roman, Byzantine, and later yet Mediaeval forts.
